parameters.name: SingleDir
parameters.description: True if the revolve is in one direction, false if in two directions (see Remarks )

parameters.name: IsSolid
parameters.description: True if this is a solid revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: IsThin
parameters.description: True if this is a thin revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: IsCut
parameters.description: True if this is a cut revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True reverses the angle of the revolution, false does not; only applies if Dir1Type is not swEndConditions_e.swEndCondMidPlane

parameters.name: BothDirectionUpToSameEntity
parameters.description: True if the revolve is up to the same entity in both directions, false if not; only applies if SingleDir is false and Dir1Type and Dir2Type are swEndConditions_e.swEndCondUpToVertex, swEndConditions_e.swEndCondUpToSurface, or swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface) (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Dir1Type
parameters.description: Revolve end condition as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: Dir2Type
parameters.description: Revolve end condition in direction 2; as defined in swEndConditions_e and only applies if Dir1Type is not swEndConditions_e.swEndCondMidPlane

parameters.name: Dir1Angle
parameters.description: Angle in radians of revolution in direction 1; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondBlind

parameters.name: Dir2Angle
parameters.description: Angle in radians of revolution in direction 2; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondBlind

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset direction in direction 1, false to not; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset direction in direction 2, false to not; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetDistance1
parameters.description: Offset distance in direction 1; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetDistance2
parameters.description: Offset distance in direction 2; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: ThinType
parameters.description: Type and direction as defined in swThinWallType_e

parameters.name: ThinThickness1
parameters.description: Wall thickness in direction 1 (if ThinType is swThinWallType_e.swThinWallMidPlane, (ThinThickness1)/2 is used for each direction)

parameters.name: ThinThickness2
parameters.description: Wall thickness in direction 2 (only applies if ThinType is swThinWallType_e.swThinWallTwoDirection)

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the results into a multi-body part, false to not

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies or components that the feature affects (see Remarks )

title: IFeatureManager.FeatureRevolve2
description: Creates a base-, boss-, or cut-revolve feature.
signature:
Feature FeatureRevolve2( 
   System.Boolean
SingleDir
,
   System.Boolean
IsSolid
,
   System.Boolean
IsThin
,
   System.Boolean
IsCut
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseDir
,
   System.Boolean
BothDirectionUpToSameEntity
,
   System.Int32
Dir1Type
,
   System.Int32
Dir2Type
,
   System.Double
Dir1Angle
,
   System.Double
Dir2Angle
,
   System.Boolean
OffsetReverse1
,
   System.Boolean
OffsetReverse2
,
   System.Double
OffsetDistance1
,
   System.Double
OffsetDistance2
,
   System.Int32
ThinType
,
   System.Double
ThinThickness1
,
   System.Double
ThinThickness2
,
   System.Boolean
Merge
,
   System.Boolean
UseFeatScope
,
   System.Boolean
UseAutoSelect
)

parameters.name: SingleDir
parameters.description: True if the revolve is in one direction, false if in two directions (see Remarks )

parameters.name: IsSolid
parameters.description: True if this is a solid revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: IsThin
parameters.description: True if this is a thin revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: IsCut
parameters.description: True if this is a cut revolve feature, false if not

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True reverses the angle of the revolution, false does not; only applies if Dir1Type is not swEndConditions_e.swEndCondMidPlane

parameters.name: BothDirectionUpToSameEntity
parameters.description: True if the revolve is up to the same entity in both directions, false if not; only applies if SingleDir is false and Dir1Type and Dir2Type are swEndConditions_e.swEndCondUpToVertex, swEndConditions_e.swEndCondUpToSurface, or swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface) (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Dir1Type
parameters.description: Revolve end condition as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: Dir2Type
parameters.description: Revolve end condition in direction 2; as defined in swEndConditions_e and only applies if Dir1Type is not swEndConditions_e.swEndCondMidPlane

parameters.name: Dir1Angle
parameters.description: Angle in radians of revolution in direction 1; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondBlind

parameters.name: Dir2Angle
parameters.description: Angle in radians of revolution in direction 2; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondBlind

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset direction in direction 1, false to not; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset direction in direction 2, false to not; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetDistance1
parameters.description: Offset distance in direction 1; only applies if Dir1Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: OffsetDistance2
parameters.description: Offset distance in direction 2; only applies if Dir2Type is swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface

parameters.name: ThinType
parameters.description: Type and direction as defined in swThinWallType_e

parameters.name: ThinThickness1
parameters.description: Wall thickness in direction 1 (if ThinType is swThinWallType_e.swThinWallMidPlane, (ThinThickness1)/2 is used for each direction)

parameters.name: ThinThickness2
parameters.description: Wall thickness in direction 2 (only applies if ThinType is swThinWallType_e.swThinWallTwoDirection)

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the results into a multi-body part, false to not

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies or components that the feature affects (see Remarks )

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select:
the sketch to revolve, using Mark = 0.
the axis of revolution, using Mark = 4 or 16.
the up-to surface, up-to vertex, or offset-from surface, using Mark = 32.
one or more affected bodies or components (only if UseFeatScope is set to true and UseAutoSel is set to false), using Mark = 1 for each.
If SingleDir is false and the revolve is up to or offset from the same entity in both directions, select the entity once and set BothDirectionUpToSameEntity to true. If you select the same entity for each direction, the second selection negates the first, and the revolve feature is not created.
NOTE
: This method provides more functionality, i.e., additional end conditions, than the now obsolete
IFeatureManager::FeatureRevolveCut2
,
IFeatureManager::FeatureRevolveThin
, and
IFeatureManager::FeatureRevolveThinCut
.
